ModMetaData.name: Archotech PowerArmor
ModMetaData.author: GeckoBoy,JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds Archotech PowerArmor
[h1]Features:[/h1] - 2 Archotech PowerHelmets - 2 Archotech PowerArmor
[h1]Research Prerequisite[/h1] - AdvancedFabrication
[h1]recipeUsers[/h1] - FabricationBench
Commissioned for "Chuckalicious#0084" from "Rimworld Mod Market" Discord.
[h1]Note[/h1] Compatibility with the following mods has been added: - More Archotech Garbage - SOS2
[h1]Credits:[/h1] - Rimworld - JangoDsoul- Art and XML coder - Conan The Civilian- XML compatibility patches
[url=https://discord.gg/7befJWr9xS][img]https://i.imgur.com/cfoFEMA.png[/img][/url]
